uri.description: The URI (or IRI) of the light profile. This field **MUST NOT** be defined if `bufferView` is defined.

mimeType.description: The light profile's media type. This field **MUST** be defined when `bufferView` is defined.

bufferView.description: The index of the bufferView that contains the IES light profile. This field **MUST NOT** be defined when `uri` is defined.

orientation.description: Unit quaternion in the order (x, y, z, w) that defines the orientation of the light distribution.
